food.question: I am yellow, you peel me and monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to peel and eat me
💛 My skin is the color of the sun
📏 I am long and curved

food.question: I am round and red. Sometimes I am green. You can eat me as a snack or in a pie. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked one very much!
🥧 People make pies with me!
🏀 I'm round like a ball.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🌱 I grow in the ground.
🔶 My color is like a sunset.

food.question: I am white and cold. You can eat me in a cone or a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I keep you cold!
🍦 I come in many flavors.
☀️ I'm a treat that's good to eat on a sunny day.

food.question: I am small and green. You can eat me raw or cooked. Sometimes I'm in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often in a pod.
🥣 I'm often served as a side dish.
🍲 I am small, round, and green.

food.question: I am made of dough. I am flat and round. I have cheese and tomato sauce on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often cut into slices.
🇮🇹 I originated in Italy.
🧀 Tomato sauce and cheese usually cover me.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or use me to make cereal taste good. What am I?

hints.text: 🐮 A large farm animal produces me.
🥛 I'm a refreshing drink.
🥣 I make breakfast cereal nice and creamy.

food.question: I am made from flour, water and yeast. I am baked in an oven. I can be sliced and used to make sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often toasted.
🥪 People put fillings between me to make a sandwich.
♨️ I am made in an oven.

food.question: I grow on trees and come in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. Some people make juice or raisins from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🌳 I grow on a tree/vine.
🥤 You can make juice from me.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, cut into long strips, and fried. People like to put ketchup on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can get me at a fast-food restaurant!
🥔 I start out as a root vegetable.
🧂 People like to put salt on me.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunshine to grow
🐄 I am yummy for farm animals
⚽ You can play on me

plant.question: I am round and red, and grow on a plant. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often the color of fire trucks
🥪 You can slice me up and put me on a sandwich
🍅 I am a type of fruit, but people think I am a veggie

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk, with green leaves on top. Birds like to make nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am bigger than a bush
🪵 You can build a house with my wood
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me

plant.question: I have colorful petals and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift
🌷 I come in many colors, like red, yellow, and purple
🐝 I need bees to help me make seeds

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. You can eat me as a snack or in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and refreshing
🪴 I like to climb on fences
🥪 You can pickle me to make a tasty treat

plant.question: I grow underground and am orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable
👓 Eating me is good for your eyes
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels and people love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I need to be cracked open to be eaten
🐿️ Squirrels hide me for the winter
🍁 I fall from the tree in Autumn

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit with a green rind and red inside. You eat me in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am mostly water
🌱 I have black seeds
⛱️ I am a perfect snack at the beach

plant.question: I have prickly skin and grow in hot, dry places. I store water inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I live in the desert
🏜️ Some types of me have flowers
💧 I don't need a lot of water to survive

plant.question: I am a small seed that can pop into a fluffy treat when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often covered in butter
🌽 I come from a cob
🎬 People love to eat me while watching films
